sentences.en: Aiqing said that any person who is a world of galactic dust.
sentences.cn: 艾青说过,任何人都是人世银河中的一粒微尘.

sentences.en: All three findings pointed to dynamic movement in galaxies and in monstrous galactic clusters, the largest stable structures in the universe.
sentences.cn: 所有的三项发现都指出，在宇宙最大的稳定结构，即星系和巨大银河星团中有动态的运动。

sentences.en: Astronomers usually assume that interstellar dust is closely confined to the galactic plane.
sentences.cn: 天文学家通常认为,恒星际星尘都是紧靠着银河平面的.

sentences.en: Beyond galactic centre, the cloud is not entirely spherical.
sentences.cn: 银河中心之外, 反物质云不是完整的球形.

sentences.en: Galactic nebulas are masses of diffuse material within our galaxy.
sentences.cn: 银河星云是我们星系中的一团团弥散物.

sentences.en: Galactic surveys show that distant galaxies are not as evenly distributed in space as theory predicts.
sentences.cn: 对银河系的研究表明，遥远星系在太空中的分布并不像理论所预言的那样均匀。

sentences.en: Ned's son was observing galactic clusters with a telescope.
sentences.cn: 内德的儿子当时正在用望远镜观看银河星团.

sentences.en: Our Milky Way, if it could be viewed edge on, would display a good example of one of these galactic bulges: Imagine the profile of a stereotypical flying saucer, though with a wider and flatter disk.
sentences.cn: 我们的银河，如果可以从边缘看向中心，就会呈现出一个这种星系凸起形态的好例子：想象一下从侧面看一个传统意义上的飞碟，尽管它有一个又宽又平的圆盘。

sentences.en: Second, the Galactic Brotherhood will assist you in the conversion of energy.
sentences.cn: 其次, 星际的手足情谊将协助你能量的转变.

sentences.en: Star positions and galactic expansion are consistent with CY 10087.
sentences.cn: 恒星位置和银河膨胀与10087历年一致.

sentences.en: The galactic affinity for material in the universe, the black hole.
sentences.cn: 宇宙中对物质具有极大吸引力的地方, 即黑洞.

sentences.en: The Galactic Dust in Corona Australis: Two blue - reflection nebulae.
sentences.cn: 南冕座星尘内,两个星云焕发着梦幻般的蓝色光辉.

sentences.en: The Galactic Federation is well acquainted with the work ofthe Master's.
sentences.cn: 银河联盟十分了解大师们的工作.

sentences.en: The tidal forces of the galactic core are still too strong.
sentences.cn: 星系核心的潮汐引力还是太强了.

sentences.en: Theage - metallicity relation AMR provides useful clues about the Galactic formation and evolution.
sentences.cn: 年龄--金属丰度关系给出了银河系形成和演化的线索.

sentences.en: These speedy electrons interact with photons in the galactic halo, boosting some of them up to the gamma-ray energies observed in the bubbles.
sentences.cn: 这些高速电子与银河晕的光子相互作用，将它们中的一些激发，使之成为泡泡中观测到的伽马射线。

sentences.en: We of the Ashtar Galactic Command thank you for your attention.
sentences.cn: 我们银河统帅阿斯塔感谢你们的关心.

sentences.en: Will Earth pass through the galactic plane in 2012?
sentences.cn: 地球这颗行星将会在2012年穿过银道面 吗 ?

sentences.en: You said something about the integration of the resistance movement into the galactic confederation.
sentences.cn: 你说过一些有关将抵抗运动整合进入银河联盟。

words.tran_cn: 银河；[天] 星系；银河系；一群显赫的人
